Uses of Package
org.vaadin.appfoundation.authentication.exceptions

Packages that use org.vaadin.appfoundation.authentication.exceptions
org.vaadin.appfoundation.authentication.util   
 

Classes in org.vaadin.appfoundation.authentication.exceptions used by org.vaadin.appfoundation.authentication.util
AccountLockedException
          An exception which is thrown if a user attemps to log in into an account which has been locked.
InvalidCredentialsException
          Exception that indicates that the given credentials are invalid.
PasswordRequirementException
          Thrown if a password validation fails due to the password not fulfilling the set requirements.
PasswordsDoNotMatchException
          Exception is thrown when two passwords are compared and when they do not match.
TooShortPasswordException
          Exception for indicating that a password is too short.
TooShortUsernameException
          Exception for indicating that a username is too short.
UsernameExistsException
          Exception which indicates that the username is already taken
